<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string Ret;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mipsabiinfo">MipsABIInfo</a> ABI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mipsabiinfo/#a87e5ac48dc2d9e13a26e34521926876a">MipsABIInfo::computeTargetABI</a>(TT, CPU, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>.MCOptions);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are both little and big endian mips.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isLittle)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Ret += </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;e&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Ret += </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;E&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ABI.IsO32())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Ret += </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;-m:m&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Ret += </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;-m:e&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pointers are 32 bit on some ABIs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ABI.IsN64())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Ret += </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;-p:32:32&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 8 and 16 bit integers only need to have natural alignment, but try to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// align them to 32 bits. 64 bit integers have natural alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Ret += </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;-i8:8:32-i16:16:32-i64:64&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 32 bit registers are always available and the stack is at least 64 bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// aligned. On N64 64 bit registers are also available and the stack is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 128 bit aligned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ABI.IsN64() || ABI.IsN32())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Ret += </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;-i128:128-n32:64-S128&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Ret += </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;-n32-S64&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ret;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register ($at) to be available before branch instructions. Tail merging</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Implemented by targets that want to run passes immediately before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// machine code is emitted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mipstargetmachine-cpp-/mipspassconfig/#a7af6f591a025bde7cd9641905e69c620"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mipstargetmachine-cpp-/mipspassconfig/#a7af6f591a025bde7cd9641905e69c620">MipsPassConfig::addPreEmitPass</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Expand pseudo instructions that are sensitive to register allocation.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The microMIPS size reduction pass performs instruction reselection for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions which can be remapped to a 16 bit instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetpassconfig/#ab2ca200281996a1a8bc064d21d4aa238">addPass</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a896b1b44b47526083da35372b1cd164d">createMicroMipsSizeReducePass</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass inserts a nop instruction between two back-to-back multiplication</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions when the &quot;mfix4300&quot; flag is passed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#adac62078b60524f3d7c10ecf9356152b">EnableMulMulFix</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetpassconfig/#ab2ca200281996a1a8bc064d21d4aa238">addPass</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9afe102416abcea9c68177ea0d06d557">createMipsMulMulBugPass</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The delay slot filler pass can potientially create forbidden slot hazards</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for MIPSR6 and therefore it should go before MipsBranchExpansion pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetpassconfig/#ab2ca200281996a1a8bc064d21d4aa238">addPass</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ade5fe5c70ca611350180fb9f7a50f42d">createMipsDelaySlotFillerPass</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass expands branches and takes care about the forbidden slot hazards.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Expanding branches may potentially create forbidden slot hazards for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MIPSR6, and fixing such hazard may potentially break a branch by extending</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// its offset out of range. That&#39;s why this pass combine these two tasks, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// runs them alternately until one of them finishes without any changes. Only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then we can be sure that all branches are expanded properly and no hazards</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exists.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Any new pass should go before this pass.</span></CodeLine>
